name: 侯劭毅
objective: 本課程將結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
schedule:
1st week: 課程簡介
2nd week: 細菌培養及bioreactor
3rd week: DNA, RNA, and  protein
4th week: Enzyme, metabolism, and metabolic engineering I
5th week: Genetic engineering I
6th week: Genetic engineering II
7th week: Genetic engineering III
8th week: 期中考
9th week: Lipid, Carbohydrate and their application
10th week: Continuous bioreactor I
11th week: Continuous bioreactor II
12th week: Metabolic engineering II
13th week: Metabolic engineering III
14th week: DNA chip & other biochip
15th week: Nanotechnology
16th week: 免疫層析法
17th week: MicroRNA偵測
18th week: 期末考
